title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Feb 28 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Feb 28 2022
description:
Clay and Buck take a deep dive into what's happening in Ukraine. Buck suggests, "No one knows, including Vladimir Putin, what this looks like in a week. I'm urging hold-and-wait before you come to conclusions." Kudlow eloquently describes how Trump would've defeated Putin. Psaki on oil. Beware of the narratives about the success of the Ukraine resistance and don't underestimate Putin. Howard Stern says Republicans support Putin. This is not your 1990's Stern, Clay says, who he used to respect. C&B take a call, which questions Putin's self-esteem and ability to withstand criticism.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
